name: 尤信程
objective: １.TTL，CMOS邏輯閘之特性實習２.組合邏輯電路設計實習含：算術電路，比較器，解碼器，編碼器，多工器，解多工器等３.序向邏輯電路設計與應用：正反器，計數器，記錄器，及移位暫存器等綜合應用４.FPGA設計規劃。
schedule:
Week 1	General announcement and lab administration
Week 2	Lab 0: Usage of Lab Equipments
Week 3	Lab 1: Characteristics of Logic Gates
Week 4   Lab 2: Logic Pen
Week 5	Lab 3: Linear Decoder
Week 6	Lab 4: Multivibrator Circuits
Week 7	Lab 5: LED dot matrix (1)
Week 8	Lab 5: LED dot matrix (2)
Week 9	Lab 6: Frequency counter (1)
Week 10	Lab 6: Frequecny counter (2)
Week 11	Lab 7: Data Communications (1)
Week 12	Lab 7: Data Communications (2)
Week 13	Lab 8: A Taste of FPGA (1)
Week 14	Lab 8: A Taste of FPGA (2)
Week 15  Lab 9: Small project (1)
Week 16  Lab 9: Small project (2)
Week 17	Final exam
scorePolicy:
Completion and demonstration of worked circuirs: 60%
Lab reports: 20 %
Final exam: 20 % (*)
* The final exam covers basic knowledge students should know to successfully complete the lab experiments. Students with final exam scores below 40 points are determined not to have enough knowledge to complete the experiments independently. Therefore, the instructor reserve the rights not count the points of some worked circuits and reports for these students.
materials: Lecture notes and reference datasheets are available as handouts.
